summary:
- **Related Party Transaction**: Raptis Group enters a Facilitation Agreement with Patmos Development Holdings (related party) to source debt/equity funding for the Sterling Residences Broadbeach development.  
- **Fee Structure**: Potential commission fee of up to **AUD 16 million** ($200k per unit settled), payable post-repayment/refinance of facility, contingent on project completion and unit sales.  
- **Timing**: Income recognition expected from FY2026 onwards, subject to project completion (anticipated May 2026) and unit settlements.  
- **Shareholder Approval**: Pending ratification via general meeting per ASX Listing Rule 10.1 due to related party nature and material fee size.
